import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-correction', templateUrl: './correction.component.html', styleUrls: ['./correction.component.scss'] }) export class CorrectionComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private router:Router){} ngOnInit(): void {} navigateTomvtstk(){ this.router.navigate(['/mvt-stk']) } }
